feed.title: PeaNUT Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for PeaNUT: v3.0.0
entry.content:
Breaking Changes

Environment variables no longer change settings directly, but instead can be used to populate settings on the first run. All settings are now handled via UI but can be modified directly by editing settings.yml.

What's Changed

  • Bump micromatch from 4.0.5 to 4.0.8 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/68
  • InfluxDBv2 support by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/71
  • Fixed bug that caused refresh to stop working
  • Added support for direct connection to InfluxDBv2 instances via environment variables
  • Added better grafana dashboard examples
  • Reworked settings into settings.yml instead of environment variables
  • Added new UI for connecting and disconnecting from nut-upsd instance
  • Fixed bug that prevented theme from switching when system theme was changed
  • Fixed bug that prevented device serial number from displaying properly

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/compare/v2.6.1...v3.0.0

entry.title: New release for PeaNUT: v3.1.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Bump axios from 1.6.7 to 1.7.7 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/77
  • New Crowdin translations by GitHub Action by @github-actions in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/79
  • armv7 Support by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/80
  • Updated NextJS to 15
  • Updated nodeJS to 22

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/compare/v3.0.0...v3.1.0
